synopsis.text:
The anime "Wonder 3," also known as "The Amazing 3," is a groundbreaking work from Mushi Production, marking their first original TV series and Japan's first made-for-TV animated program to adopt the Disney style. The story revolves around three extraterrestrial agents, Captain Bokko, Nokko, and Pukko, who are tasked with determining whether Earth poses a threat to the universe and should be destroyed using a powerful bomb.

Upon their arrival, these agents transform into the forms of Earth creatures they've captured as specimens: a rabbit, a horse, and a duck. As they navigate the planet in their tire-shaped vehicle, the Big Wheel, they observe the activities of two brothers, Shinichi and Koichi Hoshi. The older brother, Koichi, is part of a secret agent group, adding an intriguing layer to the plot.

Despite their mission, the trio becomes deeply involved in Earth's affairs, tackling issues such as ecological concerns and poverty. Their extraordinary powers and unique perspectives make them a force to be reckoned with, earning them the title of the Wonder 3. This series, filled with adventure and thought-provoking themes, invites viewers to join the Wonder 3 on their mission to decide Earth's fate.
